When the wire carries a current of <math alttext="3 microamperes" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, the string makes a <math alttext="12 degrees" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> angle with the vertical, as shown in the side view figure. The length of the wire within the region of the magnetic field is <math alttext="10 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>. Length of the supporting strings
